title: Smith: 'Cautious, but Needful' M&A to Define 2026
description: Ted Smith, president and co-founder of Union Square Advisors, discusses M&A momentum and the IPO pipeline heading into 2026 with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Ted Smith, president and co-founder of Union Square Advisors, discusses M&A momentum and the IPO pipeline heading into 2026 with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
